section.title:
sales history summarized by shipping zone
shipping zones sales history summarized by Summarized Sales History by Shipping Zone by Item
section.para: To view summarized Sales history by Shipping Zone by Item, select the "Summarized Sales History by Shipping Zone by Item" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Summarized Sales History by Shipping Zone by Item

section.para: When displaying summarized Sales history by Shipping Zone by Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display summarized Sales history by Item for all Shipping Zones.
Specify the Shipping Zone whose summarized Sales history by Item you want to display.
Select to display summarized Sales history by Shipping Zone by Item for all Product Categories.
Specify Product Category whose summarized Sales history by Shipping Zone you want to display.
Enter a Product Category pattern to select a range of Product Categories. Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in .
Select to display summarized Sales history by Shipping Zone by Item for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose summarized Sales history by Shipping Zone by Item you want to display.
Summarized Sales history by Shipping Zone by Item generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Summarized Sales history by Shipping Zone by Item generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Display lists summarized Sales history by Shipping Zone by Item, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
